data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bonfitto, Antonio, Morassi, Mauro (2014): Two new Horaiclavus (Horaiclavidae, Conoidea) species from the Indo-Pacific region. Zootaxa 3821 (1): 146-150, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3821.1.12
